item.title: Csirkepaprik√°s
item.description: Ingredients Base 2 cloves garlic 2 red onions 4 chicken thighs 2 pieces paprika 2 tbsp paprika powder 3 tbsp fat or oil 2 tomatoes water 3 pinches of salt Roux 200g sour cream 1 tbsp flour Recipe Chop the garlic, onions, paprika, tomatoes. Cut the whole thighs in half. Saute the paprika, then the onions, and the garlic. Turn down the heat, and add the paprika powder, tomatoes, 0.5dl water.
